tool.name: Tool

param.name: in_folder
param.dialogReference: Input folder is a folder that store all the CHIRPS data in .gz format.

param.name: out_features
param.dialogReference: Ouput folder defines the folder that will be created to store the result of the the toolbox.

param.name: boundary
param.dialogReference: Boundary defines shapefile that is used to mask the CHIRPS data to area of interest.

param.name: LTSYear
param.dialogReference: decides on year to calculate long term average. The data would be calculate from the earliest data. Default value: 2015

tool.summary: Rainfall Anomaly Bulk Processing is a Toolbox that helps processing rainfall anomaly from CHIRPS data. The toolbox will automatically process all the data and crop the area into area of interest.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Rainfall Anomaly Bulk Processing is a Toolbox that helps processing rainfall anomaly from CHIRPS data. The toolbox will automatically process all the data and crop the area into area of interest.
